params.0:
Leagues are time-limited game modes that give you new ways to experience the world of Gielinor.

The aim of each League is to complete tasks and earn
League Points. These points can then be exchanged for various unlocks and rewards.

To begin your journey in Leagues II - Trailblazer, use the
Get Started button below. Otherwise, you can use the
Exit Leagues button to quit.
params.3:
In Leagues II - Trailblazer, progression is key. To help you keep track of it, you have the Leagues Menu. This is an extra section to the Journal Panel whilst on a Leagues World.

Let's open the Leagues Menu now. To do so, look for the flashing quest icon on your screen.
params.4: Now that you have your <col=ffffff>Journal Panel</col> open, you can open the <col=ffffff>Leagues Menu</col>. To do so, look for the flashing <col=ffffff>Leagues tab</col>.
params.5:
Congratulations, you've completed your first task in
Leagues II - Trailblazer!

Completing tasks is the ticket to success in any League as doing so earns you League Points.

Let's take a look at the task list now. To do so, look for the flashing tasks button in the Leagues Menu.
params.7:
In Leagues II - Trailblazer, the world of Gielinor is split up into different areas. Most of these have been locked off, but you can unlock new ones by completing tasks.

Now that you've completed your first task, you can unlock a new area! To do so, look for the flashing areas button in the Leagues Menu.
params.9:
Completing tasks doesn't just give you access to new areas. The League Points you earn from completing them can be used to unlock powerful Trailblazer Relics!

Let's take a look at these Relics now. To do so, look for the flashing Relics button in the Leagues Menu.
params.11:
You are now ready to properly start your adventure in Leagues II - Trailblazer!

If you need a recap on anything, you can use the info button in the Leagues Menu at any time. Alternatively, the
Leagues Tutor in Lumbridge can provide you with some
useful guidance.

When you are ready to begin, just use the End Tutorial button below to get started.
